ygData.subject: Re: How old are you?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... retire ... a ... I m 31 and my hubby just turned 40, we both play on Bertoxx. First anniversary is coming up...I should have a party...wish I had a dwarven
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@y..., "Steven R. Hulse" <steve@k...> wrote:
> Awesome and Happy Birthday! Wow retired at 48, man I wish I could
retire
> then!
> That's cool, keep playing and have fun man! Who says you don't have
a
> life???? ;-)
>
> -----Original Message-----
> Message: 4
> Date: Sun, 28 Jul 2002 21:41:36 -0500
> From: "Orion" <orionv@c...>
> Subject: Re: Digest Number 543
>
> I just turned 48 yesterday and my wife is 40.

I'm 31 and my hubby just turned 40, we both play on Bertoxx. First
anniversary is coming up...I should have a party...wish I had a
dwarven cleric with a clicky necklace so I could make gallons of
Brell's Blessed Stout to give out..I'm too poor to be able to buy
gallons of alcohol, oh well
